function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to stagnant air and poor air circulation","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and upgrading of ventilation systems, installation of HEPA filters","Technologies":"HEPA filters, ventilation system upgrades","People":"Workers, clients, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, employers"},{"Description":"Lack of administrative control measures in the workplace","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers and clients","Mitigation":"Establishing alternative work schedules, promoting work from home, providing training and up-to-date information","Technologies":"Remote work tools, scheduling software","People":"Workers, management, clients","Owner":"Top management, HR department"},{"Description":"Inadequate biocontainment features in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of nosocomial COVID-19 infections","Mitigation":"Upgrading ICUs with negative pressure AIIR and biological containment features","Technologies":"Negative pressure AIIR systems, biocontainment upgrades","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"}]}
